text: Rafael Cadenas (born 8 April 1930) is a Venezuelan poet and essayist. He taught for many years at the Central University of Venezuela. In 2022, he won the Miguel de Cervantes Prize. ==References== ==Other websites== *Author's website *"Rafael Cadenas: “Nunca he sabido lo que es un poema”", Harry Almela, 8.31.2008 *"Contra la barbarie de la propia estimación: Entrevista con Rafael Cadenas", Claudia Posadas Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:Venezuelan writers Category:South American poets Category:Essayists Category:Academics Category:Miguel de Cervantes Prize winners
title: Rafael Cadenas
